msg: add instructions for running shared memory Hogwild training framework, i.e., training with multiple workers in single node.

msg: LUCENE-6559: TimeLimitingCollector should check timeout also when LeafCollector is pulled

author: radu
msg: SLING-4584 - Performance: XSSAPI.getValidHref should not be based on HTML filtering
* Instead of parsing a constructed temporary anchor tag, skip the HTML parsing and validate the URL directly for better performance.
